    • replyToSuggestion

      public static void replyToSuggestion(int index, ListOfSuggestions list, user.Staff staff, camppackage.Camp camp, camppackage.CampInfo campInfo, filehandler.Database database, clock.Time time)

      StaffUI class will be responsible to prompt which suggestion they want to reply to

      Index is the index of the suggestion

      StaffUI class should prompt Staff will another function call to make the necessary edits to be made from approving suggestion

      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of Suggestion in list of suggestions
      list - List of suggestions
      staff - Staff trying to reply to suggestion
      camp - Camp that received suggestion
      campInfo - Database of Camps
      database - Database of Users
      time - Current date
